attributes.review: I just got this phone not even a month ago and now every app on my phone crashes. Whenever I try to unlock my phone it powers off I have about a 3 second window to unlock my phone or it restarts. I better get a new phone out of this or I am suing. That’s right I’m taking the Karen approach I want to talk to your manager trump. This app took the longest time to download and when it finally did I was horrified by everything on their. It’s so disorganized and only helps one person our president the Oompa Loompa with corn fuzz for hair. He doesn’t think about any of us so for that reason I am out.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET

attributes.review: WORST QUEER DATING APP EVER. I was hopeful that this was gonna actually work When I first got the app it would not let me open it. Then after restarting my phone it finally would, then it asked for my credit card info, I’m not sure why it was relevant, after reading some fine print, the information would be for if you wanted to donate money, I didn’t plan on that because I am not in a financially safe place and need to save up my money. I looked for an option to opt out, but alas there was none. This is borderline thievery. DO NOT GET THIS APP. I want to rate it 0 stars, but I felt the need to inform people.
attributes.title: I was hopeful

attributes.review: I downloaded this so that I could get quicker updates on the campaign, I put in my information and the next thing you know I get about 20 text messages from these random businesses. Some of them were completely inappropriate. I donated to the charity and now I want a refund, who knows where that money went, probably a p?!n house for the president. I completely not really support the president and the last thing I want in my messages is a democratic text to vote.
attributes.title: Completely crashed my phone, took 6 minutes just to load the first page, app is just terrible

attributes.review: We love our wonderful president so I decided to download this app , our 💋 Orange 💋 president did not handle coronavirus very well.. with that being said if we had a better president with common sense , we wouldn’t be in this ✨ G L A M O U R S ✨ situation , also he’s racist I don’t support him myself I’m BLACK AND PROUD . He doesn’t like black people nor women or I should say black women . As you could see yesterday on the news he wasn’t social distancing , he doesn’t care about coronavirus , but others do people are out here loosing their lives , but does he care ? Answer: no 👎 please spread the positivity and not negativity #BIDEN2020 #TRUMPINADUMP
attributes.title: 🔥 Our orange president 🔥

attributes.review: I went to download the app and it took 4 weeks to download and then when it finally did , i opened the app and was left in utter shock . I couldn’t believe what i saw so i quickly closed the apps but then i realized my phone was not the same . All of my other apps were gone and I went to the app store to try and download everything again and they were gone . I’m in the process of getting  a new phone after I finish walking my fish ... that’s why I couldn’t go to the last rally which is a bummer cause i deserves some tickets . BUT DONT GET THIS APP IT IS COMPLETE GARBAGE 🤮😐😐😐👎🏼👎🏼!!!
attributes.title: trash ... garbage

attributes.review: This app is horrible as soon as I downloaded it and opened it it caused my phone to explode causing me to suffer third degree burns 🥵 now I look like a roast potato and when ever I attempt to use my phone it pops up adds stating Trump 2020 which caused me to seek a therapist for this horrible app it follows me wherever I go and I can’t seem to get away from it. Also once when I was waking down the stairs with my phone the add popped up and orange Oompa Loompa I was so shocked it caused me to trip and fall down the stairs breaking my ankles and neck as I fell down 32 flights of stairs would not recommend now my ankles are sore and neck broken.
attributes.title: Horrible 💕🌈💫

attributes.review: I am NOT part of Gen Z. My name is Karen and I want my review to be taken seriously. I downloaded this app in order to receive information about our incredible president but when i downloaded this onto my phone, it suddenly got very hot and about 10 minutes later, steam started coming out of the bottom. In my efforts to cool it down, i poured boiling water on top of this and then, my phone transformed into a robot form of Donald Trump and launched straight into my child’s head. It was so scary but thankfully my daughter is fine. I am very disappointed. I expect a response immediately.
attributes.title: Terrible disgusting app🥺😩💔

attributes.review: This app was probably the worst thing I’ve ever witnessed in my life! Immediately when I opened it, I was graced with a whole bunch of porn😱 What self respecting orange looking president puts porn on their official campaign app? I find it highly embarrassing to myself and to say I live in the bEsT cOuNtRy iN tHe wOrLD: The a United States of America. This issue needs to be dealt with immediately. I feel like I have to jump inside a volcano to cleanse myself of the vile filth I witnessed from the presidents app. If I could give a -5 stars I would. I would also like to speak of the manager of the app!!! The porn needs to go! The porn needs to go!
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: This app is not only an infringement on our god given American right to privacy, but just an all around horrible app. It took days to download, slowing down my phone in the process. Once I opened it, it glitched my entire phone put and everything shut down!!! Once I was finally able to start it back up, EVERYTHING on my phone was weird - the notes were jumbled, my text messages had different characters, it was SO weird. I think this app was made to steal all of our information and it will be used against us in the future. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!
attributes.title: Should be against the law

attributes.review: It took 30 days to download and it’s super slow and I didn’t wanna work it’s super glitchy The app starts to be weird and starts sending me notifications for no reason end it takes the battery power off my phone and it said f Donald Trump so I don’t know if somebody was hacking the app😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡I hate this app😡😡😡🤬 C😡😠 then it wiped out all my data and somebody called me saying where I was going to go back to my hometown and you won’t ever come back to the place where Live and also the next day I got robbed at my house so I think somebody is tracking my address😢
attributes.title: Horrible wiped out all my data
